t: Matthew 19
Marriage and Divorce
Now*p it came to pass, when Jesus had finished these sayings, that*i He departed from Galilee and came to the region of Judea beyond the Jordan.
And great multitudes followed Him, and He healed them there.
The*p Pharisees also came to Him, testing Him, and saying to Him, “Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife for just*i any reason?”
And*p He answered and said to them, “Have*r you*r not*r read*r that*r He*r who*r made*r them*ir at*r the*r beginning*r ‘made*r them*r male*r and*r female,’*r
and*r said,*r ‘For*r this*r reason*r a*r man*r shall*r leave*r his*r father*r and*r mother*r and*r be*r joined*r to*r his*r wife,*r and*r the*r two*r shall*r become*r one*r flesh’?*r
So*r then,*r they*r are*r no*r longer*r two*r but*r one*r flesh.*r Therefore*r what*r God*r has*r joined*r together,*r let*r not*r man*r separate.”*r
They*p said to Him, “Why then did Moses command to give a certificate of divorce, and to put her away?”
He*p said to them, “Moses,*r because*r of*r the*r hardness*r of*r your*r hearts,*r permitted*r you*r to*r divorce*r your*r wives,*r but*r from*r the*r beginning*r it*r was*r not*r so.*r

And*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r whoever*r divorces*r his*r wife,*r except*r for*r sexual*r immorality,*r and*r marries*r another,*r commits*r adultery;*r and*r whoever*r marries*r her*r who*r is*r divorced*r commits*r adultery.”*r
His*p disciples said to Him, “If such is the case of the man with his*i wife, it is better not to marry.”
Jesus Teaches on Celibacy
But*p He said to them, “All*r cannot*r accept*r this*r saying,*r but*r only*r those*ir to*r whom*r it*r has*r been*r given:*r

For*r there*r are*r eunuchs*r who*r were*r born*r thus*r from*r their*ir mother’s*r womb,*r and*r there*r are*r eunuchs*r who*r were*r made*r eunuchs*r by*r men,*r and*r there*r are*r eunuchs*r who*r have*r made*r themselves*r eunuchs*r for*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven’s*r sake.*r He*r who*r is*r able*r to*r accept*r it,*ir let*r him*r accept*r it.”*ir
Jesus Blesses Little Children
Then*p little children were brought to Him that He might put His*i hands on them and pray, but the disciples rebuked them.
But Jesus said, “Let*r the*r little*r children*r come*r to*r Me,*r and*r do*r not*r forbid*r them;*r for*r of*r such*r is*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.”*r
And He laid His*i hands on them and departed from there.
Jesus Counsels the Rich Young Ruler
Now*p behold, one came and said to Him, “Good Teacher, what good thing shall I do that I may have eternal life?”
So*p He said to him, “Why*r do*r you*r call*r Me*r good?*r No*r one*r is*ir good*r but*r One,*r that*ir is,*ir God.*r But*r if*r you*r want*r to*r enter*r into*r life,*r keep*r the*r commandments.”*r

He*p said to Him, “Which ones?” Jesus*p said, “‘You*r shall*r not*r murder,’*r ‘You*r shall*r not*r commit*r adultery,’*r ‘You*r shall*r not*r steal,’*r ‘You*r shall*r not*r bear*r false*r witness,’*r
‘Honor*r your*r father*r and*r your*ir mother,’*r and,*r ‘You*r shall*r love*r your*r neighbor*r as*r yourself.’”*r
The*p young man said to Him, “All these things I have kept from my youth. What do I still lack?”

Jesus*p said to him, “If*r you*r want*r to*r be*r perfect,*r go,*r sell*r what*r you*r have*r and*r give*r to*r the*r poor,*r and*r you*r will*r have*r treasure*r in*r heaven;*r and*r come,*r follow*r Me.”*r
But*p when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful, for he had great possessions.
With God All Things Are Possible
Then*p Jesus said to His disciples, “Assuredly,*r I*r say*r to*r you*r that*r it*r is*r hard*r for*r a*r rich*r man*r to*r enter*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.*r
And*r again*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r it*r is*r easier*r for*r a*r camel*r to*r go*r through*r the*r eye*r of*r a*r needle*r than*r for*r a*r rich*r man*r to*r enter*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God.”*r
When*p His disciples heard it,*i they were greatly astonished, saying, “Who then can be saved?”
But*p Jesus looked at them*i and said to them, “With*r men*r this*r is*r impossible,*r but*r with*r God*r all*r things*r are*r possible.”*r
Then*p Peter answered and said to Him, “See, we have left all and followed You. Therefore what shall we have?”

So*p Jesus said to them, “Assuredly*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r that*r in*r the*r regeneration,*r when*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r sits*r on*r the*r throne*r of*r His*r glory,*r you*r who*r have*r followed*r Me*r will*r also*r sit*r on*r twelve*r thrones,*r judging*r the*r twelve*r tribes*r of*r Israel.*r

And*r everyone*r who*r has*r left*r houses*r or*r brothers*r or*r sisters*r or*r father*r or*r mother*r or*r wife*r or*r children*r or*r lands,*r for*r My*r name’s*r sake,*r shall*r receive*r a*r hundredfold,*r and*r inherit*r eternal*r life.*r
